metadata.title: CVE-2020-24889 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A buffer overflow vulnerability in LibRaw version < 20.0LibRaw::GetNormalizedModel in src/metadata/normalize_model.cpp may lead tocontext-dependent arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-24889` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.19.5-1ubuntu1
libraw19 - 0.19.5-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.19.5-1ubuntu1').
